DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find whether exercise training lead change blood produce exercised muscle change produce new hormone affect body 's regulation sugar body weight .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Exercise Training-Induced Myokines Adipolkines Humans
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 . Body mass index ( BMI ) must ≥18.5 ≤26 kg/m2 . HbA1c value ≤5.7 % Age < 18 > 50 HbA1c ≥ 5.7 % ; heart lung disease acute systemic infection accompany fever , body ache , swollen lymph gland BMI ≥ 27 kg/m2 current diet weight loss effort current pregnancy breastfeed know history HIV/AIDS ; cancer biochemical evidence renal hepatic dysfunction ; renal liver disease demyelinate disease multiple sclerosis amyotrophic lateral sclerosis recent blood donation clinical history stroke hypertension ( systolic > 140 mmHg diastolic > 90 mmHg ) type 1 2 diabetes ; inability exercise 50 % predicted heart rate ( HR ) reserve baseline Participants take betablockers Participants screen positive The American Heart Association 's contraindication exercise test
